metadata.title: CVE-2020-11023 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In jQuery versions greater than or equal to 1.0.3 and before 3.5.0, passingHTML containing <option> elements from untrusted sources - even aftersanitizing it - to one of jQuery's DOM manipulation methods (i.e. .html(),.append(), and others) may execute untrusted code. This problem is patchedin jQuery 3.5.0.

criterions.comment: jquery package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
